name: Klink Finance
description: Klink Finance is the AI-powered infrastructure for Web3 earnings, driving crypto wealth creation through its multi-chain partner ecosystem and integration technology. Trusted by a global community of 500,000+ users across 127 countries and partnering with industry leaders like Arbitrum Foundation, Bybit, Coinbase, Crypto.com, XDC Network, Wirex, Revolut, and Ledger, Klink is fast establishing itself as the leading provider of Web3 earnings technology. Klink operates a dual ecosystem: directly serving the Klink community through its wealth creation platform, featuring exclusive partner-driven payouts, multi-chain airdrops, and Klink IDO pad launches. Simultaneously, Klink serves as a Web3 integration layer, offering easy-to-embed tools for user activation and monetization, functioning as a robust earnings infrastructure for dApps, platforms, gaming, Web3 media, mini-apps, and blockchain ecosystems.
